description: BQ Dataset must be located in <to_be_adapted> for projects in <to_be_adapted>.
DNSSec must be enbled for all CloudDNS Zones.
Weak Algorithm SHA1 is forbidden on CloudDNS DNSSec.
CloudSQL instances must have a backup schedule.
CloudSQL Instances must be in <to_be_adapted> for projects in <to_be_adapted>.
CloudSQL Instances must have a maintenance schedule.
Public access to CloudSQL Instances is forbidden.
Acces to CloudSQL Instances from Zscaler is forbidden.
CloudSQL Instances accesses must be ciphered.
GAE applications must be in <to_be_adapted> for <to_be_adapted>.
GAE applications' services should not have more than 2 versions.
GAE Applications must enable IAP in <to_be_adapted>.
GCE VMs must be in <to_be_adapted> for <to_be_adapted>.
External IPs for GCE VMs are forbidden.
GCE firewall rules logging must be activated.
Firewall rules allowing source range 0.0.0.0/0 are forbidden.
GCS Buckets must be in <to_be_adapted> for projects in <to_be_adapted>.
Legacy ABAC for GKE clusters is forbidden.
GKE clusters must be VPC-native cluster, aka using alias IP address ranges.
OAuth scope is fordiden on the service account used with GKE nodePools.
Client certificate or static password authentication is forbidden in GKE clusters.
GKE clusters must be in <to_be_adapted> for <to_be_adapted>.
GKE Clusters' Nodes with OS image other than COS are forbidden.
GKE Dashboard must be disabled.
GKE Clusters' Nodes with default compute engine service account are forbidden.
GKE Clusters must have Kubernetes Engine logging enabled.
GKE Clusters must have Kubernetes Engine monitoring enabled.
GKE Clusters must be Private.
Only up-to-date version are allowed.
Only one billing account, not need to create any other.
No owner role, no editor role on folders
Primitives roles are not authorized on organizations
Grants to domains in IAM are forbidden.
Public access to BQ Datasets and GCS Buckets are forbidden.
Named users are forbidden in IAM for <to_be_adapted>.
No adresses outside <to_be_adapted> domains are allowed in IAM.
Service Accounts keys should not be older than 100 days.
KMS keys must have a rotation period of a 100 days max.
